name.ch: 人力資源管理研究專題

goal.en:
"This course deals with the essence of human resource management for students to acquire proficiency in management knowledge and skills. As human capital becomes one of the most important assets for organizations, competing for talent and building and deploying talent resources would enhance organizations’ gaining the competitive advantage. Students aspiring to be business executives and HR professionals will find this class useful in providing theories and techniques to make better decisions and enhance organizational success.
After completing this course, you should:
- Be more familiar with specific human resource practices such as recruitment, selection, training, performance management, and compensation.
- Be more familiar with relevant theories in managing human resource.
- Be better able to diagnose strategic organizational situation and adopt HR techniques to address the issues"
